page.title: 12LLANGURIG - HOUSING
page.content: A disturbing feature at this time is that there is{outline planning permission for only{4 private {dwellings}in Llangurig and{no plans for{council dwellings;}a feature that could well effect the future of the school. All but one of the existing council dwellings have been purchased by the tenants.{Most houses are privately {owned. Properties available to rent are poor little terraced dwellings owned mainly by the two chapels. Several{run-down country cottages have been purchased and{renovated}by {people from England. The lack of any planning suggests the village will be static for some years to come. There are 4 council-owned old peoples bungalows.
